title: Terms & Conditions section
constraints: Do not create a separate Terms & Conditions page/route; keep it as a section within the existing single-page layout using the deep-link id "terms".
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new legal policy sections beyond Terms & Conditions (e.g., Privacy Policy) unless explicitly requested.
Changing backend data models or adding backend storage for Terms & Conditions content.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
